file_content.text: Come on, Luunti, we don't have time to waste, here.
I'm going as fast as I--
Too late. Hey, there. You must be the Blade.
I might be. Who are you?
Yeah.
Name's Targen. Me and my gang are freelancers, and we're here on business.
You want to explain why you're in my room?
What's this all about?
Well, we were paid pretty well, for starters. Luunti here was installing a listening device before you interrupted.
Someone wanted to know what you were up to--but I guess that plan's off, now.
All right. So what's the new plan?
Oh?
New plan is killing you. Sorry about this.
Whatever you're being paid, I can pay more.
Then let's deal.
I don't really want to cross my employer. Plus, you know, we can always grab the credits off your corpse. Guns out, folks.
You've made a mistake. You don't know who you're up against.
You're in trouble now.
See, and here I thought you were the Red Blade. Now get your guns out, folks....
You made a mistake, coming in here. You're not leaving this place alive.
Bad move. [Attack]
You think? Let's find out. Get your guns out, folks....
What are you doing here?
